DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether localized exercise , cardiorespiratory demand reduce , result great limb muscle fatigue patient COPD consequence muscle oxygenation muscle metabolism disturbance .
DOC.brief_title: Muscle Metabolism Oxygenation During Localized Fatigue-exercise COPD
DOC.criteria: COPD ( FEV1/FVC < 0.70 FEV1 < 0.80 predict Healthy subject : evidence airway obstruction ( FEV1/FVC > 0.70 FEV1 > 0.80 predict ) Smoking history > 15 packyears Chronic hypoxemia and/or hypercapnia ( PaO2 < 60 mmHg SpO2 < 88 % rest and/or PaCO2 > 45 mmHg ) Recent exacerbation ( < 3 month ) Recent cancer ( < 3 year ) Diabetes Myopathy , neuromuscular articular disease Unstable cardiac disease Absolute contraindication exercise test Regular physical activity exercise training program last 2 month Physical activity score > 9 Voorips questionnaire Thigh skinfold thickness > 15 mm BMI > 30
